actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the new job credit for wages paid to certain special education students participating in work-study programs.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend the income tax credit for the hiring of new employees under the qualified cooperative education program to include work study special education programs for handicapped children.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the new job credit for wages paid to certain special education students participating in work-study programs.
